ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It is simply a reminder to all the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: This is only a warning for mankind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: This is nothing but an Admonition for all people the world over.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It, (the Quran), is nothing but a reminder to you from the Lord of the Universe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “It is not but an advice for the entire world.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: It is only a Reminder for all the creatures."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: It is nothing but a reminder to the nations;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: It is nothing but a reminder unto all beings,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! it is naught else than a reminder for all peoples
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: this is simply an admonition to mankind,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: It is naught but an admonition Unto the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: It is just a reminder for all the nations,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: This is no less than a Message to (all) the Worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: It (this Quran) is only a Reminder for all the 'Alamin (mankind and jinns).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: This is nothing else but a reminder to all the worlds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It is but a reminder to mankind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: It is but a reminder to the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:87] It is only, in other words, the Qur’ān is only, a reminder, an admonition, for all worlds, [those of] humans, jinn and [other] rational beings, [but] excluding the angels.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! It) i.e. the Qur'an (is naught else than a reminder) an admonition (for all peoples) for the jinn and human beings.
